column2:
Test Name: ref_ccf_default
Test Tag: 1
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* Change the video clip to ccf
* Change the preset picture setting to aps
* Change the automatic brightness control (ABC) setting to off
* Change the motion detection dimming (MDD) setting to off (if applicable)
* When ready begin the ccf clip and press the OK button when the countdown timer reaches 0.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The conditions for the current test should be:

    Video Clip - ccf
    Preset Picture Setting - aps
    Automatic Brightness Control (ABC) - Off
    Backlight Setting - Default Level
    Motion Detection Dimming (MDD) - Off (if applicable)
    ccf_pps - default

Test Name: screen_config
Test Tag: 2
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* Next we will configure the camera for the remaining tests.
* When ready begin the Dots Pattern clip and press the OK button when the countdown timer reaches 0.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The conditions for the current test should be:

    Video Clip - Dots Pattern
    Preset Picture Setting - aps
    Automatic Brightness Control (ABC) - Off
    Backlight Setting - Default Level
    Motion Detection Dimming (MDD) - Off (if applicable)
    ccf_pps - default

Test Name: camera_ccf_default
Test Tag: 3
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* Change the video clip to ccf
* When ready begin the ccf clip and press the OK button when the countdown timer reaches 0.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The conditions for the current test should be:

    Video Clip - ccf
    Preset Picture Setting - aps
    Automatic Brightness Control (ABC) - Off
    Backlight Setting - Default Level
    Motion Detection Dimming (MDD) - Off (if applicable)
    ccf_pps - default

Test Name: stabilization
Test Tag: 4
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* The following test will be a stabilization test.
* We will run these continually until we get two consecutive tests with average power within 2% of each other.
* When ready begin the IEC SDR clip and press the OK button when the countdown timer reaches 0.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The conditions for the current test should be:

    Video Clip - IEC SDR
    Preset Picture Setting - aps
    Automatic Brightness Control (ABC) - Off
    Backlight Setting - Default Level
    Motion Detection Dimming (MDD) - Off (if applicable)
    ccf_pps - default

Test Name: default
Test Tag: 10 repair
Test Time (seconds): 600

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* When ready begin the IEC SDR clip and press the OK button when the countdown timer reaches 0.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The conditions for the current test should be:

    Video Clip - IEC SDR
    Preset Picture Setting - aps
    Automatic Brightness Control (ABC) - Off
    Backlight Setting - Default Level
    Motion Detection Dimming (MDD) - Off (if applicable)
    ccf_pps - default

Test Name: standby
Test Tag: 16 repair
Test Time (seconds): 2400

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* The next test will be a standby test.
* Ensure that QuckStart is set to Off (if applicable).
* Power down the TV using the remote and press the OK button to begin test.
